audio

Class ThreadPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ThreadGroup
      • audio.ThreadPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public class ThreadPool
extends java.lang.ThreadGroup
    This class is used to create a thread pool and includes methods to utilize the pool.
    Author:
    henrikwt

      Allows the threads to run together by waking up all threads that are waiting.

      Adds a task to the queue in the thread pool.
